content.raw:
Thanks for the PR, @caguero and for the insight, @thesteffinator ! 

Pull request #24 adds some extra functionality to loading custom stylesheets, and as mentioned there, I'm pursuing other leads on how to more easily offer various material design palettes that can be used by downstream projects.
content.html:
Thanks for the PR, @caguero and for the insight, @thesteffinator !

Pull request #24 adds some extra functionality to loading custom stylesheets, and as mentioned there, I'm pursuing other leads on how to more easily offer various material design palettes that can be used by downstream projects.
